=Get a activity=
 
 * Request: POST
   Input parameters:
    * id (id of Activity: INT)
    * partner_id (INT)
 * Response:
 {{{
  "code": 1,
  "message": "Success",
  "info": {
    "activity": 
      {
        "Id": 1,
        "PartnerId": 2,
        "ActionContent": "abcxyz",
        "Description": "abcxyz",
        "Title": "http://abcxyz",       
        "Name": "Action's Name"
      }
 }
 }}}
 
  
=Get activity list=
Order by newest first. 
Request: POST to Link:

params: pageSize (pageSize == 0 will return full list), pageNumber.


Response:
{{{
{
"code": 1,
"message": "Success",
"info": {
    "activity": 
      {
        "Id": 1,
        "PartnerId": 1,
        "ActionContent": "abcxyz",
        "Description": "abcxyz",
        "Title": "http://abcxyz",       
        "Name": "Action's Name"
      },
      {
        "Id": 2,
        "PartnerId": 2,
        "ActionContent": "abcxyz",
        "Description": "abcxyz",
        "Title": "http://abcxyz",       
        "Name": "Action's Name"
      }
 } 

}
}}}
